newsitem.title: USA: Duff & Phelps reaffirms CPC Intl ratings.
newsitem.headline: Duff & Phelps reaffirms CPC Intl ratings.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Thursday it reaffirmed its Single A Plus senior debt rating of CPC International Inc and D One commercial paper rating following the company's disclosure it will spin off its corn refining business.
These reaffirmations cover CPC's outstanding public debt of about $2.8 billion.

The spinoff will allow CPC's management to focus on its core operations and remove the recent volatility experienced by the corn refining business. Its corn refining business had 1996 sales of $1.5 billion and $65 million operating income.
